relevant_findings.general: No apparent distress, resting comfortably in bed
relevant_findings.HEENT: Moist mucous membranes, no oral pharyngeal lesions
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1S2, no S3/S4
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezing, coughing, or respiratory distress, reported poor aeration bilaterally, positive cough with deep breaths
relevant_findings.abdominal: Bowel sounds present, soft, tender to palpation both lower quadrants (right greater than left)
